welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Horquetas, Costa Rica! This charming city is known for its stunning natural beauty and warm hospitality. We invite you to discover and enjoy all that Horquetas has to offer during your stay. Welcome to our little piece of paradise!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rio Frio Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rio Frio Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guapiles Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Guapiles Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport handles all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport handles flights to and from other Central American countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
